# Result

```bash

Initial values:
	a = 20 (0000 0000 0001 0100 )
	b = 10 (0000 0000 0000 1010 )

+a   → 20 (0000 0000 0001 0100 )
-a   → -20 (1111 1111 1110 1100 )
a + b → 30 (0000 0000 0001 1110 )
a - b → 10 (0000 0000 0000 1010 )
a * b → 200 (0000 0000 1100 1000 )
a / b → 2 (0000 0000 0000 0010 )
a % b → 0 (0000 0000 0000 0000 )
~a   → -21 (1111 1111 1110 1011 )
a & b → 0 (0000 0000 0000 0000 )
a | b → 30 (0000 0000 0001 1110 )
a ^ b → 30 (0000 0000 0001 1110 )
a << b → 20480 (0101 0000 0000 0000 )
a >> b → 0 (0000 0000 0000 0000 )
```
